name: Cloudtact
tag_list: cloud-based, cloud, address-book, contacts, sync, mobile, native, apps, web-app, productivity
overview:
Cloudtact is a simple way to keep your address book instantly up-to-date.

Changing your phone number, email or home address? Simply update your Cloudtact profile and anyone you share your profile with will instantly have your new information on all of their mobile devices.

Have a friend who changed their phone number, email or home address? If they share their profile with you, all of your mobile devices will automatically update with their new information.

Lose your phone and all your contacts? Just sync your new phone’s address book to your Cloudtact profile and instantly retrieve all of your contacts. Your address book is securely backed up in the cloud!

You no longer need to continually update your address book when friends change their contact info. Just sync your iPhone, iPad, Android, Gmail or laptop to Cloudtact and consider it done!
